message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"name; a person's name","sentence":"她的名字是小。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animated scene showing a young girl (女) holding a big label that says '小' in Chinese characters. The girl points at the label clearly. The background is gently faded, with buildings in the distance, in warm pastel apocalypse tones.","sentence_translation":"Her name is Xiao."}
